DOC.brief_summary: Long term safety follow-up of Cal-1 recipients
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Follow up for the Detection of Delayed Adverse Events in Cal-1 Recipients
DOC.detailed_description: Long Term Follow-up for the Detection of Delayed Adverse Events in Recipients of CD4+ T Lymphocytes and/or CD34+ Hematopoietic Stem/Progenitor Cells Transduced with LVsh5/C46 (Cal-1), a Dual Anti-HIV Gene Transfer Construct
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent Previous treatment with the Cal1 modified hematopoietic cellular products Inability to understand and provide informed consent
